content.prompt: Which of the following would be the strongest evidence in support of a scientist's contention that a local area was experiencing acid deposition?

choices.label: A sudden die-off of all the fish in a local stream
A gradual increase in the temperature of a local lake
An increase in the rate of photosynthesis of aquatic plants in a local lake
A long-term increase in the pH of a local pond
An increase in the concentrations of soluble heavy metals in a local pond
